mapper.delete: delete from Comments where userid=#{userid} and id=#{id} and articleid=#{articleid}
mapper.select: select * from Comments where userid=#{userid} and articleid=#{articleid}
mapper.update: update Comments set goodnum=(select goodnum from Comment where userid=#{userid} and id=#{id} and articleid=#{articleid})+#{count} where userid=#{userid} and id=#{id} and articleid=#{articleid}
